info.name: Content Delivery API-staging
info.description:
The Content Delivery API (CDA), available at cdn.contentstack.com, is a read-only API used to retrieve content from your Contentstack account and deliver it to your web or mobile properties.

The Contentstack CDA Postman Collection is a set of preconfigured REST API requests that will make it easy for you to get started with the Contentstack Delivery APIs and try out our API requests through the Postman REST client.

Postman Collection Details

  • CDA Postman Collection Version: {version}
  • Last Updated: May 02, 2020

request.description:
This call returns comprehensive information of all the content types available in a particular stack in your account.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#all-content-types

This call returns information of a specific content type. It returns the content type schema, but does not include its entries.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#single-content-type

This call returns comprehensive information of all the global fields available in a particular stack in your account.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#all-global-fields

This request allows you to fetch comprehensive details of a specific global field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#single-global-field

The Get all entries call fetches the list of all the entries of a particular content type. It also returns the content of each entry in JSON format. You can also specify the environment and locale of which you wish to get the entries.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#all-entries

The Get a single entry request fetches a particular entry of a content type. 

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#single-entry

This call fetches the list of all the assets of a particular stack. It also returns the content of each asset in JSON format. You can also specify the environment of which you wish to get the assets.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#all-assets

This call fetches the latest version of a specific asset of a particular stack.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#single-asset

The Initial Sync request syncs the entries and assets of a stack, published on a specific environment.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#initial-synchronization

When running the Initial Synchronization or the Subsequent Sync request, if the result of the sync (initial or subsequent) request exceeds 100 records you will get a pagination_token.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#sync-using-pagination-token

The Subsequent Sync request is used to retrieve the updated content (i.e., published or unpublished content, or any published content that has been deleted) since the last performed complete Sync.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#subsequent-sync

Get entries where the value of a field within a Group field matches the condition in the query. This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#equals-operator

Get entries where the value of a field within a Modular Blocks field matches the condition in the query. This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Modular Blocks field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#equals-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#equals-operator

Get entries where the value of a field does not match the value provided in the condition. This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#not-equals-operator

Get entries where the value of a field within the Modular Blocks field matches the condition in the query. This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#not-equals-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#not-equals-operator

Get entries where the value of a field, within a Group field, matches any of the given values. This parameter will compare field values of entries to that of the values provided in the condition. This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-equals-operator

Get entries where the value of a field within Modular Blocks matches to any of the given values. This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-equals-operator

item.name: Array Equals Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-equals-operator

Get entries in which the value of a field does not match any of the values provided in the condition. This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-not-equals-operator

Get entries where the values of the fields within Modular Blocks match the condition in the query. This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-not-equals-operator

item.name: Array Not-equals Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#array-not-equals-operator

In case the referenced entry further has reference to another entry (nested referencing), you can use the dot operator to fetch the content of the nested references as well.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#include-reference

If the reference field is part of a Modular Blocks field, you need to use the Modular Blocks UID, Block UID, as well as the reference field UID using a dot operator.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#include-reference

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#include-reference

You can use queries within this query (nested querying) in order to to query on the referred entries.

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-equals

Get entries having values based on referenced fields. This query retrieves all entries that satisfy query conditions made on referenced fields.

If the reference is part of a Modular Blocks field, you need to mention the Modular Blocks UID, Block UID, as well as the reference field UID using a dot operator

Note that this query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-equals

item.name: Reference Search Equals Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-equals

Get entries having values based on referenced fields. This query works the opposite of $in_query and retrieves all entries that does not satisfy query conditions made on referenced fields.

Note that this query will work for entries only.

If the reference is part of a Group field, you need to use the Group field UID as well as the reference field UID using a dot operator.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-not-equals

Get entries having values based on referenced fields. This query works the opposite of $in_query and retrieves all entries that does not satisfy query conditions made on referenced fields.

Note that this query will work for entries only.

If the reference is part of a Modular Blocks field, you need to use the Modular Blocks UID, Block UID, as well as the reference field UID using a dot operator.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-not-equals

item.name: Reference Search Not-equals Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#reference-search-not-equals

Get entries by using regular expressions to query fields of a Group field. These regex queries will help to retrieve all the entries of a content type that have field values matching the condition provided in the query parameter.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#search-by-regex

Get entries by using regular expressions to query fields of a Modular Block. These regex queries will help to retrieve all the entries of a content type that have field values matching the condition provided in the query parameter.

This query will work for entries only and works specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#search-by-regex

item.name: Search by Regex Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#search-by-regex

Get entries that satisfy all the conditions provided in the $and query.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#and-operator

Get entries that satisfy all the conditions provided in the $and query.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#and-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#and-operator

Get all entries that satisfy at least one of the given conditions provided in the $or query.

This query is specifically for entries and works for fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#or-operator

Get all entries that satisfy at least one of the given conditions provided in the '$or' query.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#or-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#or-operator

Get entries in which the value of a field is lesser than the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than

Get entries in which the value of a field is lesser than the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than

item.name: Less Than Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than

Get entries in which the value of a field is lesser than or equal to the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than-or-equal-to

item.name: Less Than Or Equal To Within Group

request.description:
Get entries in which the value of a field is lesser than or equal to the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than-or-equal-to

item.name: Less Than Or Equal To Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#less-than-or-equal-to

Get entries in which the value for a field is greater than the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than

Get entries in which the value for a field is greater than the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than

item.name: Greater Than Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than

Get entries in which the value of a field is greater than or equal to the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than-or-equal-to

item.name: Greater Than Or Equal To Within Group

request.description:
Get entries in which the value of a field is greater than or equal to the value provided in the condition.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than-or-equal-to

item.name: Greater Than Or Equal To Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#greater-than-or-equal-to
For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#limit
For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#skip

Sort your fetched entries in the ascending order with respect to the value of a specific field in the response body.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#order-by-asc

item.name: Order by asc Operator Within Group

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#order-by-asc

Sort your fetched entries in the descending order with respect to the value of a specific field in the response body.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#order-by-desc

Sort your fetched entries in the descending order with respect to the value of a specific field in the response body.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#order-by-desc

item.name: Order by desc Operator Within Modular Blocks

request.description:
This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#order-by-desc

Get entries if value of the field, mentioned in the condition, exists.

This query is specifically for entries and work on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exists

Get entries if value of the field, mentioned in the condition, exists.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exists

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exists

Get entries in which the data of a specific field is included in the response JSON.

This query is specifically for entries and works on fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#only-operator

Get entries in which the data of a specific field is included in the response JSON.

This query is specifically for fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#only-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#only-operator

Get entries in which the data of a specific field is excluded from the response JSON, but the data of the rest of the fields are included.

This query is specifically for entries and works with fields that are part of the Group field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exclude-operator

Get entries in which the data of a specific field is excluded from the response JSON, but the data of the rest of the fields are included.

This query is specifically for entries and works with fields that are part of any block within a Modular Block field.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exclude-operator

This query will work for entries only.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#exclude-operator

This query will work for both entries as well as assets.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#count

This query will work for entries as well as assets.

For more see: www.contentstack.com/docs/developers/apis/content-delivery-api/#pagination
